achievement.name: Bravery
achievement.description: Obtain 3 subclasses and you will recive 100kk Adena!

achievement.name: Enchanter
achievement.description: Enchant one active physical skill and you will recive 1 Giant Codex Mastery!

achievement.name: Level up and you will recive 50 kk Adena!
Hero
achievement.description: Gain hero status and you will recive 35 Festival Coins!

achievement.name: Noble
achievement.description: Gain noblesse status and you will recive 20 Festival Coins!

achievement.name: Clan Leader
achievement.description: Be a clan leader of a Clan lvl 8 and you will recive 45 Festival Coins!

achievement.name: Fighter
achievement.description: Gain 200 PvPs and you will recive 120 Festival Coins!

achievement.name: Killer
achievement.description: Gain 50 PKs and you will recive 20 Festival Coins!

achievement.name: Achievement
achievement.description: Complete all personal achievements and you will recive 50 Festival Coins!
